=======
Changes
=======

1.1
===

(series for Zope 3.4 and above)

1.1
---

- Final 1.1 release. No code changes.

- Change package's mailing list address to zope-dev at zope.org instead
  of retired one.

1.1b
----

- Converted to eggs

1.0
===

(series for Zope 3.3; no dependencies on Zope eggs)

1.0
---

Initial non-dev release
